name: Space Jump (Bigometer1)
description:
In Space Jump, you get to control a red 2D square and get to parkour up floating  3D asteroids. To make things a bit more interesting, you will feel like you are lagging while climbing. (This is one of the ways Space Jump follows the "Intended Bugs" theme of Wowie 2.0). 

This game is a submission for Wowie 2.0.

My game dev channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfwFuQK5LuP1dREntkCb4xg?view_as=subscriber
